participant_1.background:
Comic Con is not my thing.
I've been told my steaks are to die for.
I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.
i wonder about what life in space would be like.
i am in school to be a computer engineer.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i vacation in florida every winter.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
I'm doing well! How are you?
I'm doing great! Just finished my last final for the semester.
Oh nice! What did you study?
Computer Engineering!
Oh cool! I'm a nurse.
Oh nice! I've heard that's a really demanding job.
It can be, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure! What do you like most about it?
I love helping people. And I also love the science behind it.
That makes sense! What's your greatest challenge?
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
That's great! I'm sure it's tough, but it sounds like you're doing a great job.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to spend time with my dog, go bird watching, and vacation in Florida every winter.
Oh nice! I've never been to Florida, but I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! I love going there to relax and spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I'm glad you have some fun hobbies to keep you busy.
Thanks! I am too.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
It was nice talking to you too! Have a good day!
You too!
